website_summaries.verdict: Designed for serious support, this mattress has a higher coil count on our shortlist.
pros: 220 coils support baby's body with vertical bars for even weight distribution, and steel supports around the sides
Multiple non-allergenic layers for support and comfort
Seems to live up to waterproof claims
cons: Some customers experienced rips in the mattress cover

customer_reviews.title: Not firm enough. As the baby gains weight, this is giving too much. Looking for new one at 8 months...
customer_reviews.text: Not firm enough... I purchased this based on the description of good support and all the coils etc. I also have general good experience with Sealy Posturepedic. However, this is a flop. My baby is now 8 months and I am looking for a new mattress... Try pressing down the mattress with your two palms, and compare the give with your own firm mattress. You can feel a big difference. If the baby could talk, she would be yelling 'oh my back pain!'...
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Like new, even after three kids have used it
customer_reviews.text: We received this as a baby shower gift off our registry with our first born in 2014. We are on our third child and this has held up wonderfully. Not even any low spots to report. Highly recommend this crib mattress!
customer_reviews.author: Lori A Wendte

customer_reviews.title: Good name, poor product.
customer_reviews.text: My newborn daughter has slept on this mattress lightly for about 2 months and it already has deep depressions where she sleeps. Very disappointing. I have even tried to flip the mattress and it doesn't help. Don't buy this. Not even firm enough anyway.
customer_reviews.author: YupYup007

customer_reviews.title: It was good for 17 months
customer_reviews.text: I've had this mattress for 17 months now. I did notice after a few months a use an indention where she sleeps (slight), but just the other day discovered that the waterproof shell / exterior part of the mattress has split and torn. I've flipped it for now so the torn side is facing down, and I'll be calling about the warranty but I'm not optimistic after reading some of the reviews here about warranty claims failing / being a large hassle.
customer_reviews.author: wabasso-way

customer_reviews.title: Purchasing Another !
customer_reviews.text: So I purchased this mattress and then just so happen to have another baby the following year. Sometimes I wish I could sleep on it myself. Both of my boys sleep though the night. (9pm-8am). Super satisfied with how soft it is and not a loud like others.
customer_reviews.author: Princess

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! The entire mattress is plastic for easy cleaning if baby has an accident...so technically you don't need a mattress protector but I use one anyways. The print is very pretty with silver and while design. Not that it matters because it gets covered with a sheet. Baby sleeps great at night. Never any problems. It is not a flat mattress and curves towards the edges...so if baby gets a little crazy in there while standing she falls down. No biggie tough!!
customer_reviews.author: CM.Hoffy

customer_reviews.title: It looks very nice and firm on one side
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my grandson. It looks very nice and firm on one side, soft on the other.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Get it
customer_reviews.text: Definitely worth the purchase. After searching for weeks decided on this one. Very happy
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Great and long lasting!
customer_reviews.text: Great price, reliable brand, and while I can't speak from experience my child seems to like it and she sleeps like a baby on it. Update: we’ve had this now for nearly 7 years and 2 kids sleeping on it (not at the same time of course). Our 3 year old still has it in her convertible toddler bed and it has kept its form shape and spring. The wipeable surface has definitely been a huge convenience over the last few years. I’d say I would purchase this again but given its longevity thus far I won’t need to.
customer_reviews.author: ClaudiaTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Comfort!
customer_reviews.text: Good mattress for the money. Easy to clean. Our grandson loves it and sleeps well. Seems to be holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: NiNi

customer_reviews.title: Firm but sags after use
customer_reviews.text: The mattress is firm, even on the spot that is molded after the baby is in it for a few nights. Yes, just a few nights. The mattress tends ot sag where the baby normally lies. I read the reviews and thought it would be ok, and it really is ok, but it is a bit of a annoyance that something so pricey can do this after just a few nights sleeps. I am still happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Stefen von Horten II

customer_reviews.title: Excellent mattress
customer_reviews.text: My baby is nine months old, he has been sleeping in this crib overnight since 3 months, and before that he took his daytime naps in it. It has held up really well and I have no complaints. It looks as new as when we first unpacked it. Crib sheets all fit without issue. He seems comfortable in it and sleeps really well.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua B.

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress.
customer_reviews.text: We have been using for over a year still holding shape. Great mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Nelson Earl

customer_reviews.title: GREAT mattress - upgraded our toddler to this mattress as his last one was foam and fell to pieces.
customer_reviews.text: Great!!! MUCH better then the last mattress we had for the crib, super happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy with covering material
customer_reviews.text: I had to return this product, I didnt catch that the covering material was not fabric. Even with quilted mattress cover and sheet, it makes a crunching plastic sound.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good mattress for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mattress for my grandson for when he comes to visit. It's firm without being too hard. Sometimes a firm mattress can be very heavy, but this one is not. It is not difficult to lift while changing the bedding. My grandson will only be using this several times a month, but because of the quality, I can see this mattress holding up well with daily use. I purchased the Carter's Keep Me Dry Waterproof Fitted Quilted Crib Pad to go with this and it is a perfect fit. I highly recommend both.
customer_reviews.author: Tash3100

customer_reviews.title: A great product. I'm glad we spent the extra money ...
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our daughter before she was born. She is now 3 1/2 and still sleeping on it. The mattress hasn't lost any bounce/support. A great product. I'm glad we spent the extra money for a quality product. Soft enough for comfort, but firm enough to not worry about SIDS for infant. Waterproof cover (non removable) has been a god send. Spend the extra money for this quality product
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: We are somewhat disappointed in that it does not seem to be as ...
customer_reviews.text: Everything with purchasing it to receiving it went well. We are somewhat disappointed in that it does not seem to be as firm as stated especially on the edges which we purchased it for and it stated it was very firm on the outside edges to keep the baby from getting between it and the bed rails. Other that that one issue a very good product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Allen

customer_reviews.title: Majorly Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: This mattress was all fine and good for about 8 months. Now we've had it for 1.5 years and it's awful! It's lumpy and you can feel the coils. We're trying to hold out for a little bit longer until we buy a set of bunkbeds. But honestly, I don't know how my daughter is able to sleep on this thing! It feels so uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Katheryn

customer_reviews.title: and felt it was good quality so I purchased it for my second child ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this mattress originally for my first son, and felt it was good quality so I purchased it for my second child too.
customer_reviews.author: Star_Resa

customer_reviews.title: Great sleep for your infant
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this as a replacement for an old crib mattress that was getting mushy and unsupportive, and found that it made a great difference in the rest that our child got, and ability to sleep through the night. It is firmer and obviously of good quality. I recommend this mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Rivendell

customer_reviews.title: The child does not know how to speak yet, ...
customer_reviews.text: The child does not know how to speak yet, so you'll have to wait a few years for a real review, I'm not the one using it. BUT so far she has not complained ;)
customer_reviews.author: Jacob B. Groby III

customer_reviews.title: Completely waterproof!
customer_reviews.text: Firm and completely waterproof. Nice, tight fit in the crib too. Very happy with the purchase. This is a high quality mattress!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie's Themes

customer_reviews.title: Toddler mattress - safe and durable
customer_reviews.text: Great crib/toddler mattress. I wanted to buy something with a trusted name so I know my baby would be comfortable and safe. This is a great mattress - it is firm but not like a rock by any means. Baby boy seems to sleep well on it. It will definitely last through the toddler bed years with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: DesignerMama

customer_reviews.title: Good mattress for the price
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for several items in a mattress for our newborn grandchildren and this one met our needs without going way off budget. I like that it is firm and offers good support, without being too hard. It fit our crib perfectly. Now when the little ones come to Grandpa & Grandma's they have a comfortable bed to sleep in.
customer_reviews.author: lil annie

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable For My Son
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my son, but he actually didn't start sleeping in his bed until he was 7.5 months. When he did he would sleep through the night and always seems comfortable. He never seems like he gets too hot and it's a nice firm mattress. I'm so glad that we ended up buying this one
customer_reviews.author: allisonlb

customer_reviews.title: No sagging
customer_reviews.text: I have had this mattress since before my 7 mo old was born. Have used the mattress nightly for a month and for many naps over the last several months. Good weight & firmness. No sagging. Right size. Good mattress. I'll update in a few months after more use.
customer_reviews.author: AZShopper

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress we really recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: Going on three years with my little angel sleeping on this mattress without any problemes. Real easy clean up after a couple of accidents.
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Buy in store instead
customer_reviews.text: Took way too long to arrive and when it did, it was damaged and already falling apart.
customer_reviews.author: N.Joy

customer_reviews.title: Good mattress.
customer_reviews.text: Mattress is firm and seems to be good quality. My two year old stopped sleeping through the night when we got this mattress but I think that's because of the toddler bed and being able to get up, not the mattress itself. We're happy with it,
customer_reviews.author: Carly Smith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice firm mattress. couldn't find a better deal in store like on amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon mom

customer_reviews.title: My baby doesn't have an opinion yet.
customer_reviews.text: Nice firm mattress. Good price for a good, standard mattress!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Airaghi

customer_reviews.title: Love this mattress!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent mattress! Have had for 7 months nows and it still looks like the first day we bought it. The crib sheet is hard to get on it. Almost like its a little bigger than a normal baby mattress depth-wise.
customer_reviews.author: SVM

customer_reviews.title: Finally a comfy crib Mattress
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several mattresses and this one is the only one my son would sleep on when transferring from his bassinet it is soft and cushiony but still safe definitely recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn Curry

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Just what we wanted. Very nice and worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer Kimberly G

customer_reviews.title: Just right firmness and perfect fit for Sealy Natural Cotton Crib Mattress Pad
customer_reviews.text: Just right firmness and perfect fit for Sealy Natural Cotton Crib Mattress Pad, 52" X... and Babyletto Modo 3 in 1 Crib with Toddler Rail,...
customer_reviews.author: Longleaf

customer_reviews.title: Really happy with this mattress.
customer_reviews.text: This mattress has held up really well for our 2.5 year old. It's still comfortable for her as well. It's also easy to clean, which has come in handy when she's caught a stomach bug.
customer_reviews.author: Marked Twine

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Nice firm mattress perfect worth every penny my daughter has no issues sleeping on this. She is 2 and was sleeping on an older mattress and from day 1 has slept all night on this mattress in her new toddler bed. Great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Day

customer_reviews.title: Crib Mattress
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this mattress based on reviews read by my DIL. She has no complaints and as I do most of the baby care, I have no complaints. The baby seems comfortable and sleeps well. It was clean and well wrapped.
customer_reviews.author: Therin

customer_reviews.title: grandma's house
customer_reviews.text: This mattress will be use at grandma's house. I was pleased with the quality for the price and there was no odor on the mattress as others stated .. but I did let it air out for a few days just in case there was any lingering plastic smell
customer_reviews.author: jat

customer_reviews.title: My daughter sleeps comfortably
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is now 10 months old. She has slept on this mattress at night for months. It appears to be firm but comfortable. I think it was a good purchase. I like that the mattress is not flimpsy or feel as if it was poorly made.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Needed to replace my little one's mattress for her toddler bed. She sneezed and coughed every night due to allergies. This solved the problem and is very soft and cushy. Perfect
customer_reviews.author: J. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: perfect for the crib purchased
customer_reviews.text: perfect for the crib purchased. My son sleeps quite comfortable on this. will definitely purchase the bigger size when he gets older.
customer_reviews.author: lovely

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Both of these I bought tore up. I don't believe we have had them more than a year. Horrible quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: great price too
customer_reviews.text: exactly as advertised and exactly what we wanted. great price too. it was delivered quickly.
customer_reviews.author: alice lewis

customer_reviews.title: We liked it so much that we ordered a second one ...
customer_reviews.text: We liked it so much that we ordered a second one for our youngest. The mattress is firm and of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Cowboy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my first grandson, I had bought his furniture at Pottery Barn Kids (expensive) but got the mattress here. He is 3 months old and the mattress is wonderful. Reasonable priced and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Klopec

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Expensive but perfect for my baby girl! She loves it and she is just an infant. And it looks great too and comes with a variety of sheets that are equally as great.
customer_reviews.author: Jamieleigh Womach

customer_reviews.title: Baby Sealy Posturepedic Mattress
customer_reviews.text: This same mattress at Babies R Us was at least $40.00 more. Its a good quality mattress that fits the crib great. The waterproof cover was also a plus. I would definatly recommend this crib mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Mitzi

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice mattress.
customer_reviews.text: Mom and Dad seem to like it. No complaints on this gift for new grandchild.
customer_reviews.author: AnnB

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied!!!
customer_reviews.text: Baby has not arrived to test the bed yet, but the bed actually fit right into the crib perfectly. Felt soft and firm and we are satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: sleepy baby
customer_reviews.text: it was a nice mattress baby hasn't been born yet but hope that it will stand up
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Kamp

customer_reviews.title: perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: I laid on this mattress and it was wonderful! Baby will surely love it. Perfect fit for Storkcraft Portifino 4-in-1 convertible crib
customer_reviews.author: ARobey

customer_reviews.title: Too soft
customer_reviews.text: Way way way too soft to be safe for an infant
customer_reviews.author: Jodi K

customer_reviews.title: Really nice mattress
customer_reviews.text: This seems to be a really well made supportive mattress. Its very heavy when lifting up to change sheets but other than that it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Chriso

customer_reviews.title: My baby sleeps well.
customer_reviews.text: Mattress is firm, like it should be. And my baby sleeps well. I trusty the sealy brand and it's posturpedic line, glad it's something I can count on for my baby.
customer_reviews.author: P

customer_reviews.title: Eh, ok
customer_reviews.text: This mattress seems to be ok. My son is 2 months old and weighs around 11 pounds. He has been sleeping in his crib since about 2 weeks old, and I started to notice an indent in the mattress almost right away even though he was a very light newborn. The indent seems to have gone away now, though, but we will see how it holds up. It fits our crib extremely well, and my son seems to sleep pretty well in his crib so I suppose the mattress must be comfortable enough for him.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good mattress for the price
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice sturdy mattress. (Not flimsy like the ones that can fold in half). I think it will withhold my son's weight as he gets bigger (he's 5 months now). It has formed a slight indent where his head usually rests. I started to rotate the mattress now and haven't noticed it anymore. My son hated his bassinet because it was so hard, but slept better in his crib with this mattress. It is a firm mattress. I wish it had a little more cushion to it, but my son doesn't seem to mind.
customer_reviews.author: Spaco213

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: As nice as any adult mattres,probably nicer than most out there.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Maetke

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very firm and I think it will last for years
customer_reviews.author: Lucy H.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for baby
customer_reviews.text: It was exactly as the supplier described and was delivered in a very short time period. Our granddaughter has no problems sleeping in it. Perfect combination of firm yet soft.
customer_reviews.author: losalkings

customer_reviews.title: Yep it is a mattress
customer_reviews.text: Other reviewers said that it smelled funny, but mine did not. It has been 11 months so far and works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Very nice mattress!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, sturdy, and just what I was looking for. Plus, you can't go wrong with a Sealy product! Price is good, too.
customer_reviews.author: Nicoli B.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE the Sealy crib mattress!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this mattress for our first grandchild! Wonderful quality. Cost significantly less than another mattress we were told was " the best ". The description of this product was almost identical to the other mattress recommended to us, but the price was almost $100 less!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Solid, firm mattress.  Satisified.
customer_reviews.text: Very firm and fits perfectly on toddler bed. Satisfied with product.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Dahle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good mattress for the money. Holding up well after the first year.
customer_reviews.author: OldHermit

customer_reviews.title: Daughter sleeps well
customer_reviews.text: We have this on daughter's crib and she sleeps great! Had this product for about a year and no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: UofAwildcat

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress
customer_reviews.text: Great matress for crib or toddler bed. Second one we've bought and absolutely no regrets buying for our two girls.
customer_reviews.author: C. R. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Excellent crib mattress
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my soon-to-be-arriving son's nursery. The mattress is the right firmness for an infant and toddler. It is a safe and secure snug fit into our Baby Cache crib from Babies R Us. All standard crib sheets fit well on this mattress. The mattress has a waterproof barrier on it already, but we bought the additional waterproof mattress pad just in case. Excellent mattress for the price...can't wait to put our son on it!
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Ponch

customer_reviews.title: Mattress
customer_reviews.text: Very good mattress, very good price. I bought this for my granddaughter and my kids tell me it is great.
customer_reviews.author: LLC

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Firm Mattress
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad that i got this mattress. I have been looking a mattress for 2 months and have no idea which one to pick. This sealy baby posturepedic is perfect for toddler and my 2.5 year old baby boy seems to like it. The price is right and the firmness is pefect for infant and toddler. I would recommend this mattress to parents who need it for their child(ren).
customer_reviews.author: Honey Girl

customer_reviews.title: He seems comfortable when laying on it
customer_reviews.text: Seems well made. Firm mattress for baby. He seems comfortable when laying on it. I like that it is waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay W.

customer_reviews.title: Indentation with only 2 months use
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter is 8 weeks and is only now 10lbs (she was 6 lbs 9 oz at birth) and there is a very noticeable indentation in the center of the mattress. So much so that she will roll into it when we place her on other spots on the mattress in the hope to "even it out". It's very disappointing as it seems unsafe and I would expect more from a Sealy Posturepedic. For now, we have flipped it over but will need to look for a new mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's such a great mattress for the price! The quality and comfort is superb!
customer_reviews.author: Debra T.

customer_reviews.title: Sealy makes nice stuff
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfect in my crib. I like it is water resistant so it wont absorb any liquids and it seems comfortable for baby.
customer_reviews.author: Bennett

customer_reviews.title: We liked the ratings/reviews of this mattress
customer_reviews.text: Tried finding a comparable mattress to the first one we bought for our oldest daughter. We liked the ratings/reviews of this mattress, however it fell way short of expectations. My 8 week old daughter had only slept on it for about 2 weeks and it started to have a visible dent where she would sleep. Considering she weighed all of about 9 lbs (if that) and was making a dent in the mattress after 2 weeks, I didn't think this mattress would hold up through the year. This mattress also retains heat too much and my daughter would be very hot and sweaty after her naps. Ended up getting a new mattress and junked this one.
customer_reviews.author: LK

customer_reviews.title: Do not hesitate to buy! You will be happy!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh! I didn't realize how bad my 1yr old son's mattress was until this one came in! I LOVE it! So much support! Firm but still super comfortable. It's perfect. I actually just purchased one for my 2yr old son. I would absolutely recommend this mattress to anyone looking!
customer_reviews.author: Mommyof2

customer_reviews.title: firm mattres
customer_reviews.text: for the price I paid, the mattress is very comfy even though I dont sleep on it..... I did test it with my hands, and it's nice and firm for a baby weighing les than 50 pounds.
customer_reviews.author: dickson mejia

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for at the right price and came on time. I would recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: svendog41

customer_reviews.title: Great for price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mattress for the price. Its firm but still comfortable. Water resistent and durable. This is my 2nd one like this. The first one is still being used by my 3yr old in a toddler bed.
customer_reviews.author: Bing Lee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my granddaughter . She now sleeps in her crib with no problems!
customer_reviews.author: Simone

customer_reviews.title: very good quality
customer_reviews.text: only gave 4 stars because there is obviously some mattress that costs copious amounts of money some where in the world that is better. For the price its perfect
customer_reviews.author: Jake Uselman

customer_reviews.title: love this mattress
customer_reviews.text: Baby is in total comfort and this mattress will last for years.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Mahoney

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Fit the toddler bed and in two years I've never had an issue. But I guess that's the point. It's a mattress, it just lies there.
customer_reviews.author: ces

customer_reviews.title: We bought 2 we liked it so much
customer_reviews.text: We bought one of these back in 2011 for our son and recently bought a 2nd for our new baby b/c we liked the mattress so much. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle M. Porter

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a baby shower gift to my sister and niece and I have not heard a complaint yet. :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just right for my kid
customer_reviews.text: My baby has been using this mattress for 6 months since birth and he almost always sleeps soundly through the night. This one is plenty firm but isn't too hard as to be uncomfortable for him.
customer_reviews.author: Justin G

customer_reviews.title: Horrible, Beware, don't waste your money on this mattress!
customer_reviews.text: I had really high hopes for this mattress! But I am extremely disappointed with this purchase! It looks like the mattress is filled with air instead of springs! It's all puffed up with air, and no way safe for a newborn or infant! I cannot believe that they have the description so wrong, and say its firm! It's super soft and wouldn't even be good for a toddler. Beware, don't waste your money on this mattress! Get a cheaper but firm one, and you will be glad!
customer_reviews.author: Swathi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was a quality product at a very good price. The price was much better than the stores price.
customer_reviews.author: John W. Hutchison

customer_reviews.title: Grandson approved!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter said it held up wonderfully for my rapidly growing grandson who learned early to stand, bounce, and jump on it! What more can one say? Yes on recommendation!
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Day

customer_reviews.title: GREAT MATTRESS!!
customer_reviews.text: VERY HAPPY with this product!!! It is very good quality and I recommend this piece for any new mothers! Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: Grace Vorobieff

customer_reviews.title: Loved this Mattress!
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely loved this mattress and got it at a great price! We would recommend others to purchase as well! Just awesome!
customer_reviews.author: joe.ugarte

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I got this mattress for my sons toddler bed. I knew it would be an upgrade from his crib mattress, which was half the price, but I was surprised that it was soooo much better. This is a good quality mattress that will last for years.
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: Great value for sleeping angels
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mattress for my first grandchild. My daughter exclaimed how nice the mattress is when she received it and installed it to the crib. Quality contruction and materials. Comparable item is $100.00 more in stores.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Graham

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice mattress. We bought this for our daughter and we're never had a problem with it whatsoever. When we found out we were expecting again, we bought this for our son. Quality is great and apparently it's comfy for baby...the kiddos sleep great! You can't beat the price on Amazon plus free shipping! :)
customer_reviews.author: lgemalsky

customer_reviews.title: We are happy with this mattress
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this mattress for my son since he was born. He is now 19 months old, and the mattress has held up very well. No sagging or imprints. No stains either, though we have always protected it with a mattress pad. My son has always slept well on it, both at night and during his naps. We plan on purchasing another one for our next baby.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli

customer_reviews.title: The pefect mattress for my new granddaughter
customer_reviews.text: Perfect firm mattress for my new granddaughters. Great match for the new Babyletto crib we also just purchased on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Crack in mattress with only 14 months of use.
customer_reviews.text: Mattress has Crack in covering with barely a year of gentle use. My little one has barely even had any accidents in his crib. The center of the mattress has had an indentation from my son for several months now and my baby is not even a big baby. I will be contacting the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Jen meyers

customer_reviews.title: Posturepedic...OK
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is just fine for my crib and baby. At times it seems just a little soft, but it is safe and provides the support expected. I will know in a year how well it holds up, but it is promising!! I could give a better evaluation if I slept on it for a night! I'd buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: pstraus

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: After very consideration of reasonably priced crib mattresses, we chose this one. It arrived very quickly with excellent packaging. It seems very firm and the cover seems to be excellent for protection.
customer_reviews.author: alissadg

product_meta.title: Sealy Baby Posturepedic Waterproof Standard Toddler & Baby Crib Mattress - 220 PostureTech Sensory Coils, 51.63" x 27.25"
product_meta.description: Adult-grade Sealy Posturepedic quality and unparalleled construction with an innerspring system that has a 60 year history of dependable support. The Sealy Baby Posturepedic crib and toddler bed mattress is engineered with an exclusive 220 PostureTech Coil System and comfort features for a lifetime of use. Measures 51.63” x 27.25” x 5.75” and fits both USA standard size cribs and toddler beds. More babies sleep on a Sealy than any other brand in the USA. Sealy proudly supports infants and toddlers with industry-leading crib mattresses known for safety, quality, comfort and premium support. Sealy is the leader in sleep technology and the best-selling crib mattress brand in North America. This crib mattress passes all the latest ASTM crib mattress standards including proper crib fit. Meets the Children’s Safe Products Act and Chemicals of High Concern to Children regulations as introduced by states like Washington and Vermont, among others. Pass CPSIA testing for lead and phthalates and each component is air quality tested for a healthier indoor environment. This mattress is GREENGUARD Gold Certified, tested for harmful chemical emissions at an independent laboratory. Sealy crib mattresses are made in the USA and backed with a Lifetime warranty on all workmanship and materials. Use for infants and toddlers approximately 0-5 years.
feature_bullets: 220 HIGH COIL COUNT -- 220 PostureTech coil system senses baby’s movement and responds with correct support. Posturepedic coil technology was designed together with an Orthopedic Advisory Board comprised of doctors, clinicians and orthopedic surgeons.
SUPERIOR SUPPORT -- All around heavy gauge steel border rods maximize side, corner and edge firmness and provides the best support for your baby.
WEIGHT DISTRIBUTION -- Steel vertical bars distribute baby's weight evenly over the entire surface of the mattress.

NON-ALLERGENIC LAYERS -- Two non-allergenic layers insulate the mattress for lasting durability, a third non-allergenic layer provides additional support and a fourth non-allergenic layer offers a plush, gentle sleeping surface. All of Our mattresses are tested for flame retardant chemicals and we do not add flame retardant chemicals.
MADE IN THE USA -- Sealy Crib and Toddler Mattresses are designed, engineered and proudly made in the USA of U. S. and imported parts. Lifetime on workmanship and materials.
PERFECT FIT -- Crib mattress measures 51. 63" x 27. 25" x 5. 75" and fits both USA standard size toddler and baby cribs. Lifetime on workmanship and materials.

AWARD WINNING BRAND -- More babies sleep on a Sealy than any other crib mattress brand in the USA. As the manufacturer, we stand behind all our products with great customer service and support. If there is anything we can do to help you, please let us know.
